root.name: AquaNox 2: Revelation
root.description: OverviewThe sequel to AquaNox, players assume the role of William Drake, as he searches for his ancestors. The game takes place primarily underwater in submarine based vehicles.PC System RequirementsMinimumWindows 98/ME/2000/XPPentium or Athlon 750MHz Processor128MB RAM (256MB for Windows 2000/XP)DirectX 932MB DirectX compatible Video CardDirectX compatible Sound Card16X CD-ROM Drive2GB Hard Disk SpaceRecommendedPentium or Athlon 1GHz Processor256MB RAM64MB DirectX compatible Video CardDirectX compatible Sound Card2GB Hard Disk Space
